pageProduct.name: Plunkett Aloe Vera 99% Pure Gel 240ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Plunkett's 99% Pure Aloe Vera Soothing Gel is a concentrated formula extracted from Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice that is rich vitamins, minerals and amino acids. With no added water, alcohol, parabens, artificial colours or fragrances, this Aloe Vera Gel is easy to apply, readily absorbed and designed to soothe and restore dry and damaged skin.

Australian owned and made, Plunkett's 99% Pure Aloe Vera is extracted from Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice which contains vitamins, minerals and amino acids. Aloe Vera, also known as 'Natures Medicine Plant' is renowned for its cooling, soothing and hydrating properties which restores dry and damaged skin. Plunkett's 99% Pure Aloe Vera Soothing Gel contains no added water, alcohol, parabens, artificial colours or fragrance and is easy to apply and readily absorbed.

Suitable For: Suitable for use on sun and wind burn and other dry, problem, itchy irritated or damaged skin

Product Claims: Vegan Friendly

Size: 240mL

Fragrance Free?: Yes

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Aloe Vera known as 'Nature's Medicine Plant' is renowned for its cooling, soothing and moisturising properties.
• WHY CHOOSE PLUNKETT'S 99% PURE ALOE VERA SOOTHING GEL? - 99% Aloe Vera (less than 1% excipients) - Certified Organic Aloe Vera - Also contains Allantoin known for its restorative properties - Low irritation due to purity - No parabens - No artificial colours or perfumes - No alcohol
• DON'T BE FOOLED! - Pure Aloe Vera from the plant is not green or blue but clear, although it may naturally darken slightly over time - 99% Pure Aloe Vera, not 100% gel
• WHY WE LOVE IT? - Light, natural gel - as if directly extracted from the plant - The Gel provides a long lasting protective film that seals over skin or wound - Soothes, cools and restores damaged skin - 99% Pure Certified Organic Aloe Vera
• TIP: Storing in the fridge will improve the cooling effect.
• RECOMMENDED FOR: Perfect for use after exposure to sun, wind and sea. Especially beneficial to help relieve sunburn and windburn, plus help minimize peeling.
• Also suitable for other dry, problem, itchy irritated or damaged skin. A great skin hydrator - effective, easy to apply and readily absorbed.

Warnings

Always read the label. For external use only. Avoid the eye area. Store below 30°

Ingredients

Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Cold Pressed Leaf Juice *, Organic Calendula (Marigold) Extract*, Allantoin, Sodium Hydroxy Methylglycinate, Grapefruit Seed Extract* * Natural and/or Organic.
*Natural and /or Organic

Active Ingredients: Active Ingredients: Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Cold Pressed Leaf Juice

Directions

Apply liberally as often as required avoiding the eye area.

USAGE ADVICE

Patch test on the inside of the arm before use.

Storage Temperature: Store below 30°
